ruling: - When [[Jinzo]] is Tribute Summoned, cards like [[Trap Hole]] and [[Torrential Tribute]] cannot be activated because [[Jinzo]]'s Continuous Effect is applied when it is Summoned, but you can negate its Summon with [[Solemn Judgment]], [[Horn of Heaven]], etc.

- If your opponent activates [[Waboku]] during your Standby Phase and you Summon [[Jinzo]] in your Main Phase, the effect of [[Waboku]] is still applied because it resolved before [[Jinzo]] was Summoned.
- If a face-down [[Jinzo]] is flipped by [[Acid Trap Hole]], [[Jinzo]]'s effect is not applied if it is destroyed by [[Acid Trap Hole]].
